title: Baby girl dies in agony after killer dad melts skin in scalding shower
text:

A baby girl died in absolute agony after her monster father put her under a scalding shower which was so hot it melted her skin.

Germanii Amarii Stewart suffered organ failure and septic shock in the horrific ordeal at the hands of the man who was meant to give her unconditional love.

The one-year-old tragic tot was pronounced dead two days after Christmas.

She had spent nine days fighting for her life in hospital having endured burns on two-thirds of her tiny body.

Her 21-year-old father Derek Anthony Shockley Jr has now been locked up for 30 years for Germanii's murder, and for shooting a man in a separate incident three months apart.

Police were called to the family home in Jacksonville on December 18 where they found the tot crying, writhing in pain with her skin peeling off.

(Image: Jacksonville County SheriffÕs Office)

Shockley claimed to police his little girl had "pooped" in her clothes while sleeping without a nappy and he was washing her off when she started sobbing, however he said this was not ususual.

He said he wrapped her in towels and laid her on the bed when he saw something unusual on her forehead, reports Arkansas Online.

He rubbed it and her skin began to peel. The dad claimed he then carried Germanii to his mother's room to show her, and when he removed the towel more skin fell off.

Shockley's mother, Lavern Shockley, 39, said to police she told her son to call 911 as soon as she saw her granddaughter's injuries.

She said she asked her son how hot was the shower, and he told her "not very hot at all."

Investigators found the water temperature measured at 113 degree from the shower and 153 degrees from the bath.

Shockley was initially charged with second-degree murder but it was upgraded to first-degree battery of a child, the felony equivalent of first-degree murder.
